WorkItem.Description: Add a pie chart with a wedge for each cateogory, with wedge width based on the total weight of all tools under each category, where clicking on a wedge will show the current in-category pie chart on one side of it. Think of this as a nested pie chart. This way the user has a good overall view of all scores, along with a detail view of one selected category.
WorkItem.Summary: Add a pie chart by category
